name: CreateGithubMilestone
description:
Create a milestone in a GitHub repository.

Use this tool to create a new milestone in a specified GitHub repository, useful for project management and tracking.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The GitHub username or organization name that owns the repository. Not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository, not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: milestone_title
parameters.description: The title of the milestone to be created in the GitHub repository.

parameters.name: milestone_description
parameters.description: A text description of the milestone to be created in the GitHub repository.

parameters.name: milestone_due_date
parameters.description: The due date for the milestone in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

value_schema.description: The milestone due date. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: milestone_state
parameters.description: State of the milestone, either 'open' or 'closed'.

value_schema.description: The state of the milestone. Either `open` or `closed`.
